name: swapper (Graham Marlow)
description:
A small block-pushing puzzle game with swapping mechanics. 25 levels of sokoban-influenced gameplay  to satisfy your puzzling needs.

Enjoy!

How to play

Cover square tiles with a block of matching color. Red blocks allow you to swap places horizontally, purple blocks vertically.

  • Arrow keys: Move the player
  • X: Swap with horizontal (red) or vertical (purple) block
  • Z: Undo
  • R: Restart

Made in PuzzleScript. Color palette by Vinik.
